DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To identify factor associated disease recurrence patient high-grade cervical intra-epithelial neoplasia ( CIN ) undergo large loop excision transformation zone ( LLETZ ) . Study Design : A case-control study include 103 patient . Patients include study history surgery conization LLETZ histopathological diagnosis cervical intraepithelial neoplasia grade II III ( CIN II CIN III ) . Follow-up exam conduct every six month Pap smear collection colposcopic examination biopsy , necessary , minimum period twelve month . Cure define normal follow-up examination within 24 month . During follow-up , relapse occur cytology and/or biopsy result show CIN return 12 month , time new cervical conization LLETZ perform .
DOC.criteria: 1. history surgery conization 1. 18 year age , 2. immunosuppressed , 3 . Patient histopathological diagnosis lowgrade intraepithelial neoplasia 4 . Patient invasion , surgical margin obtain LLETZ unable evaluate .
